description.value:
Creature Type. You are a Fey.

Size. You are Medium or Small. You choose the size when you choose this species.

Speed. Your Speed is 30 feet.

Darkvision. You have Darkvision to a range of 60 feet.

Eerie Token. As a Bonus Action, you can harmlessly remove a lock of your hair, one of your nails, or one of your teeth. This token is imbued with magic until you finish a Long Rest. While the token is imbued in this way, you can take these actions:

  • Remote Viewing. If you are within 10 miles of the token, you can enter a trance as a Magic action. The trance lasts for 1 minute, but it ends early if you dismiss it (no action required) or are &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false]. During this trance, you can see and hear from the token as if you were located where it is. While you are using your senses at the token's location, you are blinded and deafened in regard to your own surroundings. When the trance ends, the token is harmlessly destroyed.

  • Telepathic Message. As a Magic action, you can send a telepathic message to the creature holding or carrying the token, as long as you are within 10 miles of it. The message can contain up to twenty-five words.

Once you create a token using this feature, you cannot do so again until you finish a Long Rest, at which point your missing part regrows.

Hex Magic. You can cast the @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplDisguiseSe]{Disguise Self} and @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplHex0000000]{Hex} spells with this trait. Once you cast either of these spells with this trait, you cannot cast that spell with it again until you finish a Long Rest. You can also cast these spells using any spell slots you have.

Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma is your spellcasting ability for these spells (choose the ability when you gain this lineage).

Hexling Proficiency. You gain proficiency in two skills of your choice, and when you make an ability check with these skills you can roll a d4 and add the number to the ability check.

advancement.title: Hex Magic: Disguise Self
advancement.hint:
You can cast the disguise self spell with this trait. Once you cast this spell with this trait, you cannot cast this spell with it again until you finish a long rest. You can also cast this spell using any spell slots you have.

Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma is your spellcasting ability for these spells (choose below).

advancement.title: Hexling Proficiency
advancement.hint: You gain proficiency in two skills of your choice, and when you make an ability check with these skills you can roll a d4 and add the number to the ability check.

advancement.title: INT Bonus
advancement.hint: Core rule that provides a bonus based on character level and intelligence modifier at levels 6, 12, 18.  Does NOT apply retroactively and is not affected by temporary changes in Intelligence stat (from items or other buffs/debuffs).

advancement.hint: Core rule that provides a bonus based on character level and intelligence modifier at levels 6, 12, 18.  Does NOT apply retroactively and is not affected by temporary changes in Intelligence stat (from items or other buffs/debuffs).
